venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Just kidding........It's not really swamp water......... Rent a tube, jump in the water and float down 2.5 miles of the beautiful waters of the Farmington River in Connecticut.

http://www.farmington...

We will ride directly to the river in Connecticut on Saturday morning. The ride down will be mostly highway. After tubing we will ride about 30 minutes to the Springhill Suites by Marriott in Windsor Locks and then go to dinner.

https://www.marriott....

On Sunday we will ride to the Bridge of Flowers in Shelburne Falls, MA on the Mohawk Trail.


Costs:

River Tubing: $20

Hotel room is $111. Each room can sleep 5. (2 queen beds and a pull out sofa.)
If you are willing to share it will cost less than $25 each.

You can book your own rooms or if you need to share June will coordinate getting people together.

Meeting location: Dunkin Donuts in Randolph

Meeting time: 8 am
riders meeting 830 am
ride leaves 845 am

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Swamp Water Revenge (aka River Tubing Overnight)
